goal.ch: “本課程的目的在於讓學生瞭解企業在應用網路時所需的各種技術知識。除了基本的TCP/IP技術外，本課程亦將針對企業電腦網路的新興應用，例如VoIP, P2P等做深入介紹與探討，以培養學生掌握電腦網路應用發展趨勢的能力。“
goal.en: “To help students to comprehend the various technologies necessary for building a modern  enterprise‘s information systems. In addition to basic TCP/IP techniques, we also introduce advanced network technologies , such as VoIP and P2P, etc., to enable the students to adopt the development trends of future Internet applications.“

outline.ch:
授課大綱:
1. Networking: Welcome To The Cloud
2. Network Standards
3. Network Security
4. Network and Security Management
5. Ethernet(802.3)Switched Lans
6. Wireless Lans (I)
7. Wireless Lans (II)
8. TCP/IP Internetworking (I)
9. TCP/IP Internetworking (II)
10. Carrier Wide Area Networks (Wans)
11. Networked Applications
